overview: Those dirty lads at Uk Naked Men are at it again with "Spurt Locker". This two and a half hour sweat and cum drenched romp is an exclusive, hardcore sports themed film with the likes of Kurt Rogers, Carioca, Ross Hurston and Rick Bauer cruising through London's saunas and gyms and plowing hot, tight, juicy arses on their way.
title: The Spurt Locker
